title: Riot help plz account issue
body:
could you msg me back on this board asap considering an account issue ,i got home from work on Wednesday and noticed that someone had played a few games on my acc, with the obvious choice being my brother i went and bullied him until he told me, he insisted that he didn't so i believed him, i went to school the next day and when i got home i noticed i was missing some ip . i was curious and checked my purchased list and saw that "i" bought a quintence of attack speed , i went to ask my brother again this time alot more furious i force him to tell me the truth . he denied once again and made him promise that it wasn't him. so today i only just got home from work and my other brother was home so i asked him if he had played my account ,he denied as well, so we all went on lolking to check my match history and noticed a lot of ranked and aram matches had been played ,i checked who had played with "me" in that game and i don't recognize any of the names so i changed my password 
please msg back on this asap
i would appreciate it if you guys could at least get rid of all my ranked games including the win cause that wasn't em either

replies.body:
When you created an account to play League of Legends with, you agreed to make sure that you are the only one who will play it. To make sure of this, you also agreed to not share your password with anyone.

A red will not remove games from your account because you claim to have not played them. It causes a plethora of issues, especially since the games will not be removed from the people whom you played them with.

You've already taken the best action, that is to change your password. Be sure not to write it down anywhere or let someone look over your shoulder as you're typing it in.
